COURSE

MATHEMATICS/YORUBA   
 FC-PANK    
  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Yoruba one (1)    Arts and Science 
subject.  
  
Mathematics, Yoruba and any one (1)   
Science/Arts subject.  
  
MATHEMATICS/YORUBA L2  
 FC-PANK    
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics and any three (3) Arts and Science 
subjects.  
  
Mathematics, one (1)   Arts and one (1) Science 
subject.
